PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN INVESTMENT BOARD REGULATIONS by allowing the Investment Board to invest, at its discretion, up to 50% of the funds that it allocates to invesments in domestic equities.

precis:
Regulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN INVESTMENT BOARD REGULATIONS
by allowing the Investment Board to invest, at its discretion, up to 50%
of the funds that it allocates to invesments in domestic equities.
